html: (2 Nephi 15:30)."Behold darkness and sorrow, and the light is darkened in the heavens." Victor Ludlow stated: "The 'darkness and sorrow' might refer either to physical or spiritual conditions as destruction and apostasy rage upon the earth. The light 'darkened in the heavens' seems to suggest the gospel or the Messiah himself coming forth out of obscure darkness." (IPSP, 123-24.)
